General.Name: Beeio Honey Ltd
General.Description: B.H. Whitestone Group Ltd. operates in the real estate business and construction industry in the United States. It acquires, develops, manages, and leases residential investment properties, such as apartment buildings and condominiums. The company was formerly known as Orckit Communications Ltd. B.H. Whitestone Group Ltd. was incorporated in 1990 and is headquartered in Tel Aviv, Israel.

2.Name: Mr. Tomer  Dafna
2.Title: Chief Exec. Officer of Whitestone Assets Company Inc.
